root: ^This is an alternative controller RPG. Put your glove on!
^Flip your hand to show the 'Go' marker.
^Move your hand to each of the different locations on the grid.
^You can also move your hand Near, Mid, or Far from the webcam to adjust the depth.
^To recognize rotation, start by turning your hand 90 degrees counter-clockwise.
^Now, rotate your hand clockwise to choose the desired target.
^To select your chosen target, cover the 'Palm' marker with your fingers and flip your hand to show the 'Go' marker.
^Great job! Welcome to the Iron Region.
^Will you lead the quest to find Beholderite?
